text: Eyes Wide Shut is a 1999 drama movie directed by Stanley Kubrick. It stars Nicole Kidman and Tom Cruise and is set in New York City. The movie was filmed at Mentmore Towers. == Other websites == * Category:1999 drama movies Category:1999 mystery movies Category:American drama movies Category:American mystery movies Category:British drama movies Category:British mystery movies Category:English-language movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Stanley Kubrick Category:Movies set in New York City Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:1990s thriller movies
title: Eyes Wide Shut
